topic.title: Best VPN or Roll my own?
topic.body: Can anyone recommend a good VPN, limited logs, pay with BTC or a place I can roll my own VPN like Algo or Streisand?  thx - PurpleBarnDoor

1559069408_19aXxMN25h3rLrxTb3hjy7WJns13M.body:
> [franc](#comment_11_166W3JhPgc183GgfmPqRdKebZbPgjsfaR4): What about selfhosting? http://www.pivpn.io/

Good Idea I have a few Pi3's laying around. Only problem is the network, I need to toss them onto a GSM provider or something separate from my current network.

@kropptyler https://www.zerotier.com I read it over and it looks good, the code is open source, but I worry about registering my network on their site, to create the encrypted WAN for all devices. Have you used ZeroTier before?

8_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body:
> [hackermobs](#comment_2_1AHZ7t3mynNFD7giEo86Pm93nCBjJEhtRo): Can anyone check if my zite is running properly? [...]

yes it is...
